short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government of Services Canada on behalf of the Real property services has a requirement for the purchase and delivery of furniture products.
description: The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile. If you do not have an SAP Ariba account, register here (http://canada.supplier.ariba.com/ad/register/SSOActions?type=full). If you already have an SAP Ariba account, login here (http://canada.supplier.ariba.com/ad/register/SSOActions?type=full).
